reviews.text:
As I waited for my food so I can deliver they were very polite and food smells amazing!!!(under statement). If you‚Äôre gonna enjoy your time here at the bar or just to enjoy your meal  great environment to do so.  waitresses and cooks do their job very well. This is an above average bar and grill they hold a high standard to what they do. A great manager is in the presence of this bar and great owner. High class. 

When you do come you will not be disappointed Beverly‚Äôs finest please enjoy
Food was not cooked, but drinks were great

I get to eat here a lot since I work nearby. I got to say the customer service is always fantastic and they keep the spot well organized all the time. Pricing is reasonable and they serve generous portions.
Great "rib" special on Thursdays! Sit at the bar or large tables! Very friendly wait staff and reasonable prices! I'll frequent again!

I wanted to see for myself what all the hype was about regarding their burgers, so I took the fam over to Fibber McGee's Bar and Grill tonight for dinner. 

Man, was I blown away by their PBJ & Bacon burger, which was a more savory take on those flavors than originally anticipated, which I loved. 

The burger patty itself might have been the most perfectly cooked medium I've ever stuffed in my pie hole! Roll was nice and squishy, but also held everything together without falling apart. Rounded out the dish by opting for perfectly fried onion rings on the side.

Great meal all around, and will definitely be back to try some of the other burger options I was considering!üçîüçîüçî
